Sentence: In total, 12 RMs were used across the various groups in our DSS studies ( 6 RMs for SIV - uninfected acute colitis model, 2 RMs for SIV - uninfected chronic colitis model and MRI and 4 RMs for SIV - uninfected untreated controls).

All rodent species were maintained on powdered laboratory rodent chow ( Formula 8904, Harlan Teklad, Madison, WI), except for woodrats, which were fed powdered rabbit chow ( Formula 2031, Harlan Teklad, Madison, WI), given that woodrats are herbivorous and develop diabetes and metabolic syndromes when fed omnivorous diets ( Post et al. 2015; Schmidt - Nielsen et al. 1964).
